main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Kodiak, Yakutat, Alaska, on October 9-10, 1966, for a duration of approximately 29 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be translucent on the airbound portion and opaque on the sea-shaped portion,It was observed by multiple witnesses, including military personnel and Coast Guard pilots,An initial estimate suggested it might be a balloon, yet the actual observation indicated characteristics of a UFO,Additional details included a hand-drawn sketch depicting a silver, disc-shaped object with a translucent appendage,The observation was complicated by bad weather conditions affecting radar tracking and visibility.
sighted object: a silver, disc-shaped object with a translucent appendage
witness description: Coast Guard pilots, Fleet Weather observers, and tower operators
